detail_desc: Lined balconette bikini top with underwired, lightly padded cups, draping at the front, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and an adjustable metal fastener. Side support and a silicone trim.
Short, double-breasted jacket in felted fabric with narrow notch lapels and concealed press-studs at the front. Handwarmer pockets and flap front pockets. Lined.

Bra in lace and mesh with underwired, mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and good support. Adjustable shoulder straps that are lace-covered at the front and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Calf-length dress in a fine, rib-knit viscose blend with a collar, V-neck and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with slits in the sides. Unlined.
Popover jacket in soft fleece with a kangaroo pocket, stand-up collar and zip at the top with a chin guard. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Patterned swimsuit with a frill around the neckline that continues over the shoulder straps, and a decorative bow at the back. Lined gusset.
Fine-knit socks with a scalloped edge.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with low heels and fluted soles. The boots are made partly from recycled polyester.
Cargo trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets, flap leg pockets and a fake back pocket.
Jersey top with narrow shoulder straps.
TOCA LIFE x H&M. Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
V-neck blouse in a crinkled weave with a sheen. Wrapover front with covered buttons at one side and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Metal keyring with a carabiner hook and soft faux fur pompom. Diameter 5 cm, length approx. 12 cm.
Calf-length skirt in woven fabric. High waist with covered elastication, and gathered seams at the hips and hem for added width. Unlined.

Hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif and jersey-lined hood. High collar, a zip at the top with a ring pull, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shorts in woven fabric. Relaxed fit with an elasticated, drawstring waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets and a welt back pocket.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Jumper in a fine knit with ribbing around the neckline and hem, and long sleeves with ribbed roll edges.
Ankle boots in glossy jersey with round toes and a soft, stretchy shaft. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 7.5 cm.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Glittery, flared skirt in three layers of tulle with covered elastication at the waist and a soft cotton jersey lining.
Top in sweatshirt fabric decorative seams on the sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long cardigan in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the opening, cuffs and hem.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar, buttons down the front, a double-layered yoke at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and wide sides with drawstrings.

Suit trousers in woven fabric with an extended waistband, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly with a concealed button. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets, an adjustable tab and button at the sides and legs with creases. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Waist bag in woven fabric with leather sections. Two-way zip at the top, a zipped outer compartment and a zipped inner compartment. Adjustable strap with a metal fastener. Lined. Size 4x16x26 cm.
Fitted top in a rib knit with a collar, V-neck, long sleeves and raw edges at the cuffs and hem.
Set with a T-shirt and pair of leggings in printed cotton jersey. T-shirt with an opening and button at the back of the neck and short puff sleeves. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Set with a hair grip, hair clip and a pair of hoop earrings in metal decorated with beads in different designs. Length 7 cm. Diameter of earrings 3.5 cm.
Clamdiggers in washed cotton with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and front and back pockets.
Hairbands in stretch cotton jersey with a sewn-on bow at the front.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide, foldover waist panel for best fit over the tummy.
Shirt jacket in sturdy cotton twill with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, patch front pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Round bag in braided paper straw with two handles at the top. Lined. Size 10x43x43 cm.
Long-sleeved cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with buttons down the front and a scalloped trim around the neckline and cuffs. Ribbed hem and short slits in the sides.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in washed, sturdy cotton denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and a raw-edge, cut-off hem. The cotton content of the skirt is partly recycled.
Patterned swimsuit with lightly padded, moulded cups and a low-cut back. Fully lined.
Waist bag in fabric with a zip and embroidered text on the front. Adjustable waist strap with a plastic fastener. Lined. Size 7x12x30 cm.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a round neck and buttons down the front.
Long cardigan in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Shorts in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and press-stud. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Hobo bag in soft, grained imitation leather with a handle and zip at the top and two inner compartments, one with a zip. Lined. Size 15x28x36 cm.
Bikini briefs in microfibre and lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Wide, V-neck jumper in a knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Short, fitted dress in soft cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Multi-strand metal chain bracelet with wooden beads and marled plastic beads. Toggle clasp in brushed metal.
Balconette bra in lace with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape the bust. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
A-line dress in airy seersucker with covered elastication at the top and shoulder straps with decorative ties.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, concealed front pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with gathers. No buttons. Lined.

Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend. Regular waist with concealed elastication and a zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Baby Exclusive. Cardigan in a textured organic cotton knit with a lined hood with ears at the top. Zip down the front with a chin guard, and long raglan sleeves. Lined.
Tube scarf in soft, rib-knit cashmere.
Round-necked jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton and cashmere blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Skirt in shimmering metallic jersey with a glittery elastic waistband. Satin lining.
Calf-length skirt woven in a cotton blend with pleats at the top, a detachable tie belt and concealed side pockets. Unlined.
Soft, non-wired bras in lace with adjustable shoulder straps and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners.

All-in-one suit in a soft cotton blend with a jersey-lined hood, concealed zip down the front with a chin guard and wide, foldover ribbing at the cuffs and hems. The cotton content of the all-in-one suit is organic.
Polo-neck collar in a soft rib knit with a longer front and back and ties at the sides.

Dress in a patterned viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with patch front pockets. Unlined.
Slides with a large bow at the front, imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Block-coloured top in sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Three-strand neckline of thin metal chains decorated with small plastic beads and round pendants. Adjustable length, 45-53 cm.
Dungarees in sweatshirt fabric made from soft organic cotton. Straps with press-studs, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the hems. Soft brushed inside.
Pyjamas with a strappy top and shorts in a soft viscose weave. Top with narrow shoulder straps and a wide flounce at the hem. Shorts with narrow elastication at the waist and a frill trim at the hem.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and half-string back.
Trousers in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist in a relaxed fit. Pockets in the side seams, a slightly lower crotch, and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Twill cap with an appliqué on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
T-shirt in jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with embroidery.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Leather belt with a metal buckle. Width 4 cm.
Balconette bra in lace with underwired, lightly padded cups that lift and shape, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and hook-and-eye fasteners at the back.
Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a small collar, cap sleeves, yoke at the back and rounded hem.
Warm-lined ankle boots with a zip at one side and loop at the back. Soft pile linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Twill trousers with a high waist, zip fly and button, back pockets and slim legs with stripes down the sides.

Straight-cut trenchcoat in soft imitation suede with notch lapels and a loose yoke. Detachable tie belt at the waist and discreet pockets in the side seams. No fasteners. Unlined. The pocket linings are made from recycled polyester.
Metal earrings in various designs. Size 1.2 cm-1.5 cm.
Short dress in ribbed jersey with a small frilled collar and long, sleeves with a flounce at the cuffs. Seam with a detachable tie belt at the waist and a gently bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders and long puff sleeves with pleats for added volume and width. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Tunic in soft, patterned jersey with an opening and buttons at the top, gathered shoulders and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Rounded hem with slits in the sides.
